edge_1: Thunderbirds is a science fiction action-adventure film based on the television series created by Gerry and Sylvia Anderson. In this film, International Rescue (IR), led by widowed former astronaut Jeff Tracy, operates as a secret organisation that aids those in need.
edge_2: In the film, International Rescue is now referred to as 'Thunderbirds' by the general public whereas it was not explicitly mentioned in the original series.
